reviewtext: I have typically been a Linksys only customer, but being frustrated with some of their products lately I decided to make a switch, and I'm glad I did.  It's compact design makes it easy to tuck it away. I have yet to have a problem with the 2 that I bought, one for home and one for work.  They have been running 6 months and counting with all the ports active in both locations.
summary: Excellent Low Priced Switch for Home and Office
